refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: aset sets the nth element of a string, array or vector where nth is a zero-based index. If the first argument is a string, the nth character of string is replaced with the ASCII value given in the third argument elem.

refsect2.title: nelem
refsect2.para: The new element. If arg is a string, its nth element will be replaced by the ASCII value given in new_elem.

refsect1.title: Return Values
refsect1.para: Aset returns nelem. It modifies its first argument.
